tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE patient_diagnostic_results (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    diagnostic_test_id INT,
    test_date DATE,
    test_result FLOAT,
    diagnosis VARCHAR(255),
    treatment_plan TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE PatientTests (
    patient_id INT,
    test_date DATE,
    test_name VARCHAR(50),
    test_result FLOAT,
    PRIMARY KEY(patient_id, test_date)
);

CREATE TABLE TrendAnalysis (
    trend_id SERIAL,
    patient_id INT,
    trend_date DATE,
    trend_description TEXT,
    PRIMARY KEY(trend_id),
    FOREIGN KEY(patient_id) REFERENCES PatientTests(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE patient_demographics (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(255),
  date_of_birth DATE,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  address VARCHAR(255),
  contact_number VARCHAR(15)
)

CREATE TABLE test_results (
  result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  test_date DATE,
  test_type VARCHAR(50),
  result_value FLOAT,
  result_units VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE trend_analysis (
  analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  result_id INT,
  trend_type VARCHAR(50),
  trend_value FLOAT,
  trend_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE treatment_plans (
  plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  treatment_details TEXT,
  prescription VARCHAR(255),
  plan_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE TestResult (
  result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  test_id INT REFERENCES Test(test_id),
  patient_id INT REFERENCES Patient(patient_id),
  result_value FLOAT,
  result_date TIMESTAMP
);
